title: Sold: 1909-11 T206 Christy Mathewson Portrait Sovereign 350 BGS 1.5

posts.post_title: Sold: 1909-11 T206 Christy Mathewson Portrait Sovereign 350 BGS 1.5
posts.post_content:
For sale is a T206 Christy Mathewson Portrait Sovereign 350 BGS 1.5. Not one of the more common backs found on Matty. PM or email me at [url]eppersmatt@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or offers. 

Matty- $325 Sold
